text: John S. Rockwell is known as the "father of Oconomowoc."http://www.oconomowoc.org/about/history/ He is responsible for building many of the city's original foundations: a grist mill, the first store, hotel, fire department, elementary school,and library.http://www.oconomowoc.org/about/history/ Rockwell also donated land for the community's churches, and started Bord du Lac, a women's seminary.also donated land for the community's churches, and started Bord du Lac, a women's seminary ==References== Category:People from Oconomowoc, Wisconsin
title: John S. Rockwell
